name: David SHEPPARD, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee
name_abbreviation: Sheppard v. Pennsylvania Board of Probation & Parole

parties: David SHEPPARD, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 8th day of August, 2011, the appeal is DISMISSED due to Appellant’s failure to file a brief. The Application for Summary Relief/Application for Stay is DISMISSED AS MOOT.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
29 A.3d 366
David SHEPPARD, Appellant v. PENNSYLVANIA BOARD OF PROBATION AND PAROLE, Appellee.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Aug. 8, 2011.
